name: OxygenTherapyHCPCS
title: Oxygen Therapy (HCPCS)
description: HCPCS codes that pertain to Axon Registry measure 68 for cluster headache acute treatments.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Oxygen therapy),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Oxygen therapy),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

concept.display: Stationary compressed gaseous oxygen system, rental; includes container, contents, regulator, flowmeter, humidifier, nebulizer, cannula or mask, and tubing
Stationary oxygen contents, gaseous, 1 month's supply = 1 unit
Oxygen accessory, flow regulator capable of positive inspiratory pressure
Oxygen concentrator, single delivery port, capable of delivering 85 percent or greater oxygen concentration at the prescribed flow rate
Oxygen concentrator, dual delivery port, capable of delivering 85 percent or greater oxygen concentration at the prescribed flow rate, each

contains.display: Stationary compressed gaseous oxygen system, rental; includes container, contents, regulator, flowmeter, humidifier, nebulizer, cannula or mask, and tubing
